/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and green accents that add a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. On the sidewalks, people can be seen going about their day, adding a human element to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
